original_text: But it is easier for heaven and earth to pass away than for one dot of the Law to become void.
korean_text: 그러나 율법의 한 획이 떨어짐보다 천지가 없어짐이 쉬우리라

sentences.original_text: But it is easier for heaven and earth to pass away
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 하늘과 땅이 없어지는 것이 더 쉽습니다

sentences.original_text: than for one dot of the Law to become void.
